page.title: 11JUNIORS AT GT. WAKERING SCH.
page.content: THE 1ST AND 2ND YEAR CHILDREN (7-9YEARS OLD) MAKE UP THE LOWER JUNIOR CLASSES.CLASS 2M'S TERM PROJECT HAS BEEN,'HOLES,GAPS AND CAVITIES'. THEY HAVE STUDIED THE SCHOOL POND AND WILD AREA.THEY ALSO WENT TO COLCHESTER ZOO.SARAH AND EMMA FOUND THE TALK BY P.C. PICKERING ABOUT THE PHONETIC ALPHABET AND A VISIT BY THE POST-CODE BUS VERY USEFUL AS PART OF 2G'S PROJECT ON COMMUNICATION.ONE OF THE TWO 1ST YEAR CLASSES HAS STUDIED PLANT LIFE.THEY MADE REGULAR VISITS TO THE WILD AREA,AND ALSO GREW MANY PLANTS,FROM SEED IN THEIR OWN CLASS ROOM.
